channel.title: [317] Only 1 connection per ip?
channel.description: I have been coding this server for about 4 days and I tried logging on to it on my laptop and my main computer, which both have the same ip, and all it did was login on the 1st one and say "error connecting to server" on the other computer.. How can I make it so that I can have more than 1 connection per ip address?

item.title: [317] Only 1 connection per ip?
item.dc:creator: @vallarta3908 vallarta3908
item.description:
@vallarta3908 wrote:

I looked all over the server tutorials and they were all about how to limit the connections, not how to actually raise the max connections from 1 to 2 or 3. Any help?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Only 1 connection per ip?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Go to server tutorials. Im sure there is a guide to this.

Read full topic
